item.title: NIKHIL DHANDRE
item.description: I am open source enthusiastic. I started my journey in the world of binary digits from school. I love electronics and software, learning new things daily. I always try to put my imagination into this world using my hardware and software knowledge. As a profession, I choose software but I love to spend time on electronics basically on IoT. I choose Python as my main language. For controllers, I used Embedded C.
